channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 32 Best Deals at Walmart’s Competing Prime Day Sale
item.description: Walmart is competing with Amazon this Prime Day, offering great savings on our favorite laptops, 4K TVs, earbuds, and other WIRED favorites.

item.title: Helios wants to be the AI operating system for public policy professionals
item.description: Helios, a startup aiming to build an AI-powered operating system for policy professionals, has raised $4 million in seed funding.

item.title: AI chatbot’s simple ‘123456’ password risked exposing personal data of millions of McDonald’s job applicants
item.description: Security researchers found two flaws in an AI-powered chatbot used by McDonald’s to interact with job applicants.

item.title: 8 Best USB Hubs (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Ditch the dongles. These multiport USB hubs will maximize your connectivity options.

item.title: Just 4 days until TechCrunch All Stage kicks off in Boston — and the lowest ticket prices vanish
item.description: Time’s running out. In just four days, TechCrunch All Stage 2025 touches down at Boston’s SoWa Power Station on July 15 — and your chance to lock in s...

item.title: Eufy’s Floodlight Security Camera Is Cheaper Than Ever This Prime Day (2025)
item.description: If you want to beef up your home security this Prime Day, Eufy’s Floodlight Camera is a great way to do it.

item.title: 10 Best Laptop Docking Stations (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Connect your laptop to your monitors, keyboard, mouse, and everything else you need, with one simple cable.

item.title: Humanoids, AVs, and what’s next in AI hardware at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 hits Moscone West in San Francisco from October 27 to 29, bringing together 10,000+ startup and VC leaders for three days of b...

item.title: Microsoft and OpenAI's AGI Fight Is Bigger Than a Contract
item.description: A key clause in Microsoft and OpenAI's deal embodies the raging divide between AGI true believers and those who think it's still a long ways off.

item.title: YC-backed Apolink by 19-year-old bags $4.3M to build 24/7 connectivity for LEO satellites
item.description: Apolink, a Y Combinator-backed space-tech startup, has raised $4.3 million in an "oversubscribed" seed round at $45 million post-money valuation to bu...
